openThreads.summary: Find apartment in Vienna with registration possibility for visa process
openThreads.notes: Move-in March 15 - April 1. Anna S. waiting for reply about mid-March flexibility. Yvette waiting for photos. Clara B. already forwarded.

openThreads.summary: Get US visa for Daniela (Colombian with Austrian residence card)
openThreads.notes: Depends on Vienna apartment with registration. Then Colombia trip after.

openThreads.summary: Figure out what to eat — ongoing daily struggle
openThreads.notes: Jan 31: pizza takeout + homemade salad. Feb 1: new day, Sunday.

openThreads.summary: Organize move from Brașov to Vienna
openThreads.notes: Started list at 12:37 UTC. Storage: pans, knives, blender, airfryer, water boiler, bed cover. Sell: PS5, 2 desks, chairs, gym stuff, MacBook. Need cartons. Dani asked to add items but hasn't yet.

askedAbout.question: What do you usually have in the fridge for salad stuff?
askedAbout.context: They mentioned getting pizza + making salad, I suggested options and asked

context: Cata & Dani are in Brașov (Coresi) until April 1. Moving to Vienna for 1-2 months to get Daniela's US visa sorted (she's Colombian with Austrian residence). Then Colombia to visit her family. Food is a huge daily struggle — bad quality in the area, never know what to eat. Jan 31 evening: wine mode gaming chat. Cata feels bored after Elden Ring, everything feels like brain rot. Discussed many game recommendations. Cata values deep, systems-driven games like Kenshi - not 'brain rot' mainstream stuff. Conversation ended naturally late night (~23:30 their time). Feb 1: Sunday, no new activity yet.

gaming: liked Elden Ring (ruined other games for him)
wants good graphics, not pixel art
values systems-driven games over scripted content
